title: Party Clothing Survey
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Hey, Ayumu-chan! I want to ask you something about the Christmas party tomorrow~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Sure, what is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Have you decided on what to wear?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Not yet. I want to wear a dress that I really like, but maybe a knit sweater with the lace skirt I bought the other day would be better~. I’m not sure.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Mhmm.... You’re not sure.... You’re not sure, right? Ayumu-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Y-, yeah....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>If you’re not sure, then how about this one! You-chan’s special handmade Santa outfit!! You should wear this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeeeh!? Uhh, umm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I prepared one for everyone~. Let’s all wear it for the party tomorrow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Everyone....!? I want to match with everyone! Thank you, You-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
